DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Attacks the given target ship with one or more anti-ship missiles.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>targetShip</myVariableName> <myType>simulationobject</myType> <myLabel>Target Ship</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue></myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>DtAllAggregatesFilter;DtSurfaceAggregatesFilter</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>numMissiles</myVariableName> <myType>integer</myType> <myLabel>Number of Missiles</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>1</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
